1.0.name: wordpress/infosource
1.0.description: Clean and crisp with the option to display links to your profiles on all the popular social networks, the Infosource Theme is just that… all the essentials for a professional blog. Of course it supports custom menus, widgets and has a full width template so it is pretty versatile and could be used for any number of applications.
